price: until when Gog and Magog are let loose, swarming swiftly from every mound,
arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا فُتِحَتۡ يَأۡجُوجُ وَمَأۡجُوجُ وَهُم مِّن كُلِّ حَدَبٖ يَنسِلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: ḥattā idhā futiḥat yajūju wamajūju wahum min kulli ḥadabin yansilūna
